attributes.action: No NHS Prescription Charge for people who suffer with Asthma.
attributes.additional_details:
In 2014 1216 people died from Asthma.

Asthma attacked hospitalise someone every 8 minutes; 185 people are admitted to hospital because of asthma attacks every day in the UK (Asthma UK)
attributes.background:
If someone is diagnosed with Asthma, it isn't their fault. So why should we have to pay for a prescription for something that is essential? 

5.4 million people suffer with asthma in the UK and every 10 seconds, someone is having a potential life-threatening attack (Asthma UK)
